text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Hiiu County | settlement_type = County of Estonia | image_flag = Hiiumaa_lipp.svg | flag_size = 125px | image_shield = Hiiumaa_vapp.svg | shield_size = 75px | image_map = Hiiu in Estonia.svg | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Estonia | seat_type = Capital | seat = Kärdla | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Riho Rahuoja | area_total_km2 = 1023 | population_total = 10097 | population_as_of = 2009 | population_density_km2 = auto | iso_code = EE-39 | website = | footnotes = |coordinates= }} Hiiu County () is one of the 15 counties of Estonia. It is the smallest county both in terms of area and population. It is made up of Hiiumaa, the second-largest island of Estonia, and several smaller islands near it. == Municipalities == The county has 1 rural municipality - Hiiumaa Parish. The only urban settlement, Kärdla, is part of the parish since 2017. == References == == Other websites == * Hiiumaa.ee – Hiiumaa portal * Hiiumaa County Government – Official website (in Estonian)
title: Hiiu County
